programme.title: Gung Hay Fat Choy (M) Ep78
programme.desc: In a bad economy, many people dream of becoming rich overnight, especially the Jiang family. Mother Jiang pushes her three children to earn money so that they can one day live in luxury. Even her daughter-in-law wishes for the same thing. She hopes that one day she can visit her parents with the money that spills out of her purse.

programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness (T) Ep79
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5117

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep1
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.title: Taste of Life (T) Ep2
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Just Eat (M) Ep37
programme.desc: In the new culinary show Just Eat, celebrities reveal their favorite chefs and memorable dishes. This series explores how these culinary experiences have impacted their lives, from overcoming personal struggles to finding new career paths. Join us to discover the flavors and stories that resonate with these well-known personalities.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2359
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness (T) Ep80
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep5118
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Life Must Go On
programme.desc: When the midnight gymnasium programme for wayward teenage girls is at funding risk, social worker Yanki puts together a dodgeball team to compete in a match and save it. With an ex-star athlete John as the coach, the girls realize they must face their problems and overcome their challenges instead of dodging them. Can they finally win the match?

programme.title: S Storm
programme.desc: ICAC Chief Officer Luk witnesses a suspects murder while investigating an illegal soccer gambling case, but is unable to disclose information to Chief Inspector Lau due to his code of confidentiality, thereby hindering Laus investigation. While starting the case with mutual distrust, they end up reaching a rapport to uproot the crime syndicate.

programme.title: Once in a Blue Moon
programme.desc: Mei Zhens family appears to get along but harbours deep secrets. Mei Zhen is trapped in a dead-end job with a toxic boss, her brother hides his separation and their mother grapples with lingering guilt over her husbands departure years ago. As Mid-Autumn Festival approaches, can the family heal their wounds and find a way back to each other?

programme.title: Infernal Affairs II
programme.desc: In this prequel, the secrets of Infernal Affairs are revealed - the resentment between police superintendent Wong and crime boss Sam, as well as the beginning of the parallel fates of the two moles, Yan and Ming. The keys lie in the hands of Sam's wife, a ruthless kingpin and a righteous cop.

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: To overhaul the underground gambling industry, the police join hands with the gambling association to crack down on illegal casinos. They auction off new casino licenses to regulate the industry, but this results in an upheaval in the gambling world, unveiling the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: Love Lies
programme.desc: Gynaecologist Veronica downloads a dating app for fun. Little does she know that the charming French engineer on the other end is actually a local con artist named Joe, who is a member of an online scam group. As their fake relationship unfolds, both Joes guilty conscience and Veronicas hopes intensify.

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tangs demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tangs strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: One More Chance
programme.desc: Chow Yun Fat stars as a down-on-his-luck gambler, Water, whose ex-girlfriend asked him to take care of their autistic son. As Water lives with his son, he soon finds his goal in life. When he discovers his sons talent in running, Water decides to give up his dissipated life and support his son to achieve his dream.

programme.title: The Phantom Lover
programme.desc: In 1926 China, Sung, a talented singer, is deeply in love with To, a sweet innocent girl from a wealthy family. Their love evokes strong disapproval from To's father and bitter jealousy from her designated fianc, a young man chosen by her family. This is a story about a singer and a wealthy girl battling to be together in a traditional community.

programme.title: Soul Mate
programme.desc: July and An Sheng have been best friends since they were thirteen. They always believed their friendship would last forever, until they meet Su Jia Ming at the age of eighteen. The trio find themselves in a love triangle, which puts the girls friendship to the test and alters their destinies.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Midnight Fly
programme.desc: With her marriage in crisis, Michele takes off to Europe for a vacation and meets a Japanese woman named Miki. As they become friends and travel together, Michele discovers that Miki is her husband's mistress. When Miki goes missing in Morocco, Michele does everything she can to find her but ends up paying a heavy price

programme.title: Detective Vs. Sleuths
programme.desc: Hong Kong is rocked by a series of cold-blooded murders whose victims are runaway suspects of unsolved cases. The group of killers calls themselves The Chosen Sleuths". Former top detective Lee vows to bring the brutal killers to justice and prove himself to be the real Chosen Sleuth instead of a lunatic.

programme.title: Love Lies
programme.desc: Gynaecologist Veronica downloads a dating app for fun. Little does she know that the charming French engineer on the other end is actually a local con artist named Joe, who is a member of an online scam group. As their fake relationship unfolds, both Joes guilty conscience and Veronicas hopes intensify.

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: Tainted Love
programme.desc: Office lady Zhou Ran falls victim to an online dating love scam and is cheated of 550,000 yuan. Following faint clues left by the scammer, Zhou Ran comes to a small coastal town and encounters two young men. She gradually discovers that these two men have hidden the clues of the scam, and sets out on her revenge plan.

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong 3
programme.desc: Gambling tycoon Man suddenly marries his new partner Sophie, which shocked his only son, Ken. In the wake of Man's heart attack, Ken must battle Sophie - who has persuaded Man to transfer his grand master title to her in the event of his death - for the rightful claim to the familys gambling business in a riveting game of mahjong.

programme.title: Shining for One Thing
programme.desc: Zhang Wan Sen plans to confess his crush on Lin Bei Xing after the college entrance exam, but an accident changes everything tragically. As Zhang feels helpless and devastated, he fortuitously travels back in time with Lin before the accident happens. Can he make amends and convey his regrets this time?

programme.title: To Live and Die in Mongkok
programme.desc: Fai (Nick Cheung), a legendary triad figure, was convicted and sent to prison for slaughtering a bunch of people. 30 years later, with the help of a social worker (Chan Lai Wan), Fai release from prison, the city of Mongkok has totally changed and he has almost forgotten his way back home. Disoriented and trapped in the notorious town of vices, Fai must find his way out of a life with a mother suffering from Alzheimer's disease (Paw Hee Ching), a hooker girlfriend (Mo Xiaoqi) with her mentally-challenged younger sister (Natalie Meng), and a malicious cop (Liu Kai Chi) hot on his tail.

programme.title: Where The Wind Blows
programme.desc: Founded in the 70s, Hong Kongs ICAC is committed to fight corruption in the police force. Detectives Lui Lok and Nam Kong build a corruption system that creates conflicts between the triad and the police. When ICAC hunts down the two, their control finally comes to an end. Where the wind blows, Hong Kong is no longer what it used to be!

programme.title: Tales from the Occult: Body and Soul
programme.desc: This horror anthology series returns to feature three spooky crime stories about an ex-hair model, a cat lover and the love triangle between a dental nurse, a dentist and a chef. The stories depict their paths from obsession to madness, eventually tipping them over to the dark side of human nature.

programme.title: Young Heroes of Chaotic Times
programme.desc: This story is set in Shanghai in the late Qing Dynasty, and talks about a young man, Chen Zhen, who rises to become a national hero after enduring hardships and overcoming challenges in life.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: As Wudang disciple Zhuo Yi Hang confronts the Demon Palace, he reunites with Lian Ni Shang, the woman who once saved him, and their love reignites. Lian, a disciple of the Demon Palace, endures torment to be with Zhuo but is shattered when he accidentally injures her. A fierce battle between good and evil unfolds!

programme.title: 72 Tenants of Prosperity
programme.desc: Ha Kung and Shek Kin are sworn brothers, but become sworn enemies in business and every aspect of life after Pinky, the girl they love, marries Ha Kung. It is only when the property owner of both their shops wants to terminate their tenancies forty years later, that they are able to resolve the rivalry.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs
programme.desc: Yan is a police mole in the triad and joined them before he graduated from the police academy, while Ming is a triad mole in the police since young. Leading parallel lives, both men feel increasingly trapped in their false surroundings, and a series of cat-and-mouse chases ensue as both the triad and the police compete to uncover the others mole.

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: Ching is a forensic psychiatrist who has the power to enter a persons subconscious mind. In her latest case, she suspects that another psychiatrist is responsible for a brutal murder-cum-suicide case involving a social worker. In the investigation process, Ching finds herself under suspicion instead, as she comes face-to-face with a past trauma

programme.title: Cloudy Mountain
programme.desc: When a decade-long tunnel project is about to complete, an earthquake strikes and leads to a series of subsidence and landslides. The tunnel and a nearby town are at stake. A retired soldier and his son step up to try and stop the disasters at source. Will the authority decide to blow up the tunnel to save the 160,000 people in town?

programme.title: Love at First Lie
programme.desc: An ordinary, cheerful and kind-hearted girl Bao, meets a troubled rich guy Edward by chance one summer. To ruin his fathers remarriage plans, Edward hires Bao and her friend to sabotage the wedding and that is how Bao and Edward meet and fall in love. All seems well for the sweet couple until their love quickly takes an unexpected turn

programme.title: Fight Back to School
programme.desc: The number one killer in SDU, Chow Sing Sing(Stephen Chow), is sent to a school to find a lost gun. His partner Tat(Ng Man Tat) pretends to be a school worker in assisting him. They recognize that some students are being closed with Fei, the head of triad society, and Fei traffics munitions. Sing steals and ignites Fei's munitions; Fei pledges to kill Sing...

programme.title: Killers Five
programme.desc: The Dukes daughter has been kidnapped by the notorious Golden Dragon Hill bandits. A swordman named Yue Zhen Bei is assigned to save her, and expecting many dangers on the journey, Yue garners help from a group of good friends who are also kung fu masters.

programme.title: The Lotus Lamp
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays both mother and son in this lavish fable about a goddess who falls in love with a mortal scholar (Cheng Pei-pei in her debut role). Over two years in production, it was released on the first anniversary of Linda's tragic suicide.

programme.title: The Twin Swords
programme.desc: Gui Wu and his wife Gan Lian Zhu are the famous Twin Swords in the martial arts world. One day, they stumble upon a kidnapping plot at the Red Lotus Temple and Lian Zhu is held captive. Wu successfully escapes to find the Gan family for help, not knowing that he is sending them into an ambush by the kidnappers. Can he finally save Lian Zhu?

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: A tragic tale about a young girl who gets married and has five kids. When she and her husband die, leaving all five kids behind to fend for themselves, the eldest child is forced to be sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: Killer Darts
programme.desc: A group of bandits raided the village where dart master Liu lives and killed his wife. While hunting them down, Lius disciple kills a farmer and his wife when she refuses his advances, leading Liu to adopt their orphaned daughter and raises her with his son. Years later, the daughter meets a man with the bandits and is tricked to go against Liu.

programme.title: The Three Smiles
programme.desc: A talented scholar, Bo Hu, is attracted by the pretty maid, Qiu Xiang. In order to get close to her and win her love, he disguises as a servant to work in the same household. Qiu Xiang does not believe Bo Hu when he discloses his true identity to her, only falling in love with him when he reveals his talents and with his friends help.

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Lord Li Ming is a feudal tyrant who oppresses the people, and even the Emperor who is his brother, cannot stop his evil act. Righteous swordsman Mu poses as Li Mings guard to plan for his assassination. He arrests six assassins who have tried to kill Li Ming, before making them his allies in a secret plot to kill him and end the tyranny.

programme.title: Inside The Forbidden City
programme.desc: Justice Bao discovers that Consort Lis new born son was swapped at birth and that she was expelled from the palace by Empress Liu twenty years ago. He sets Eunuch Guo up to confess his conspiracy with the Empress. Empress Liu is convicted for her act and Consort Li finally reunites with her son who is now the Emperor.

programme.title: Death Duel
programme.desc: Third Master is a renowned swordsman in the martial arts world, but the constant challenges by other swordsmen compel him to fake his death and pursue a secluded life. This does not prevent others from seeking him out to challenge him however, and he is forced to return to fight his way till the end.

programme.title: Tropicana Interlude
programme.desc: Ping and Su are lovers who operate a travel agency specializing in Southeast Asian holidays. Tung, a school mistress, and her students join a guided tour lead by Ping. During the trip, a spoiled kid Li is attracted to Ping but Su thinks Ping has fallen for Tung and leaves. How will Ping deal with the situation and ends up happily back with Su?

programme.title: The Sentimental Swordsman
programme.desc: Li Xun Huan is a sentimental swordsman who has lived peacefully outside the martial arts world for the past ten years. He returns home after knowing that the Plum Blossom Bandit is back to his old tricks, only to find that everything has changed.

programme.title: The Battle Wizard
programme.desc: Dali Prince Tuan Yu knows nothing about martial arts, but leaves the palace for the martial arts world. He meets a snake sorceress and his mysterious half-sister. Through various misadventures, Tuan Yu gains invincible power by sucking the cobras blood and swallowing the magic toad, eventually defeating his fathers old rival.

programme.title: Godfather Of Canton
programme.desc: A docker, Lin Si Hai, accidentally saves Commissioner Cheng who then offers him a position in the police force. Lin is smart and soon rises through the ranks through treachery and corruption, before becoming a gangster.

programme.title: Madam White Snake
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai is perfect as Pak Su-cheng, the stunning snake goddess who assumes a womanly form so that she can taste the pleasures of a human life! Pak seduces young scholar, Hsu Hsien when she recognises him as her saviour in another life 1,000 years ago. But when Buddhist monk Fa Hai finds out about the union, the pair is forced to split...

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his masters rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gaos betrayal

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: Singer Qing Qing and architect Peng Nan are a devoted couple. Qing Qing sacrifices herself to help Peng Nan when his family is going through difficulties and is misunderstood by Peng Nan, leading to their break up. When Peng Nan learns the truth and decides to make up with Qing Qing, he finds out that she is suffering from a terminal illness.

programme.title: The Eunuch
programme.desc: A year before Lo Wei directed Bruce Lee in Fist Of Fury, he wrote and co-starred in this tale of a treacherous devil who wants nothing less than supreme power...and doesn't care if he has to murder the Emperor and use his own daughter as a deadly dupe to get it.

programme.title: The Purple Shell
programme.desc: Hui and Ha are stuck in their unhappy marriages and are attracted to each other when they meet at a party. In one of their beach strolls, Ha picks up a purple shell and gives it to Hui as a memento. When Huis husband finds out about them, he hurts Hui and causes her to become seriously ill, while also blackmails Ha. How will this love story end?

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his fathers death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the Toad Stance and accidentally unveils his true identity

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiance suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiance accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couples brothel.

programme.title: Five Elements Ninjas
programme.desc: The film is about a Chinese martial arts school finds itself outclassed by their rivals, they hire elite ninja from Japan to destroy the school. The lone survivor of the massacre learns the secrets of ninjutsu and seeks revenge against the ninja.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: The Twin Bracelets
programme.desc: Two teenage girls make a pledge to look after each other in a small Chinese fishing town, where the notions of women's rights or sexual freedom are absent. One ends up happily married to a stranger, while the other is cruelly betrothed to the abusive son of a wealthy family and has to seek to free herself from the situation.

programme.title: Super Inframan
programme.desc: Transformed from a young laboratory researcher, the thunderbolt-fisted Inframan must battle Princess Dragon Mom who wakes up from hibernation to conquer the earth with her army of mutant monsters.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husbands death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: Legend Of The Fox
programme.desc: A young man, Chin, believes he is an orphan, until he meets three men and learns from them that his father was a great swordsman who was killed when he was trying to dispel rumors of a wrongdoing and return a lost sword to its rightful owner. Chin seeks out the mens help to take vengeance on the wrongful death of his father.

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Huns warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: The 14 Amazons
programme.desc: The Yang family had served their country in Song Dynasty for generations. When General Yang is ambushed and killed during the war in Jin Shan, the grand matriarch led the entire family to take revenge and defend the country.

programme.title: The Karate Kid III
programme.desc: John Kreese, ostracised and penniless, tries to take revenge on Daniel and Miyagi with the assistance of a Vietnam War comrade who is the wealthy proprietor of a poisonous waste disposal business.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Mercy, Part II - In the aftermath of Cobra Kais win at the Under 18 All Valley Karate Championships, Johnny questions his dojos philosophy and deals with a figure from his past. Daniel searches for the right way to respond to Cobra Kais dominance.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Back In Black - When Daniel starts teaching his first karate students, he questions whether he can fill Mr. Miyagis shoes. Johnny invents some unorthodox training methods with help from an unlikely source.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Fire And Ice - Daniel pulls out all the stops in an effort to recruit new students to Miyagi Do. Johnny reflects on some of the major relationships in his life - and responds to Daniels promotional efforts with his own.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep4
programme.desc: The Moment Of Truth - Daniel makes another attempt to promote Miyagi Do, and receives guidance in a familiar form. Johnny grows suspicious about Kreeses backstory. A new Cobra Kai student challenges Miguel and befriends Aisha, while Robby revisits a past hed rather forget.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep5
programme.desc: All In - Daniel struggles to help a new student learn. Miguel makes a new connection, while Johnny tries to repair a relationship. Tensions between the two dojos build to a breaking point.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Take A Right - Daniels students are given a lesson in overcoming their grudges. Johnny spends some time away from the dojo, while Kreese exerts his influence.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Lull - To prepare his students, Daniel gives some new training methods a shot. Miguel puts a new lesson into practice. Johnny makes a tough but pivotal decision that affects Cobra Kai.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Glory Of Love - Daniel works to make amends with Amanda, while Johnny is introduced to the world of dating apps. Complications arise when Miguel, Samantha, Robby and Tory cross paths.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Pulpo - Johnny cautiously takes a stab at love, while Daniel and Amanda enjoy a romantic date night. An attempt to bring the students of the two dojos together backfires as hostilities between the teens escalate.

programme.title: Cobra Kai S2 Ep10
programme.desc: No Mercy - Its the first day of school at West Valley High but tensions between the two dojos have not cooled with the end of summer. And the rivalry between Daniel and Johnny comes to a head.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Daniel moves to a new town where he is harassed by some boys who have mastered karate. He decides to learn it and when Mr Miyagi starts his training, he learns that there is more to the art form.

programme.title: Saving Venice
programme.desc: Venice is under attack from climate change. Flooding is becoming more frequent. With each inundation of seawater, more salt impregnates the city's historic buildings. As it crystallises, it rips the bricks, mortar and stone to shreds. The city is crumbling. Venice's very existence is hanging in the balance. Can scientists and engineers find ways to protect this unique jewel of architecture, beauty and culture before it's too late?

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Deion Sanders - The retired footballer travels to the southern Utah desert after his kids accuse him of softness. They hike through the desert, but Deion's fear of snakes causes problems when they encounter one in the wild.

programme.title: Big Little Journeys S1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Taiwanese pangolin travels through a land of giants to seek a mate, and in Brazil, a family of tamarins travel to the edge of their world to seek a new future alongside humans.

programme.title: Michael Portillo's Long Weekends S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Stockholm, Part 2 - Michael unleashes his inner Sherlock to uncover the story behind Stockholm Syndrome.

programme.title: Engineering Reborn S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Series 1 - Discover how the St Louis Rail Station went from being the biggest in the United States to falling into disrepair.

programme.title: Running Wild with Bear Grylls S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Deion Sanders - The retired footballer travels to the southern Utah desert after his kids accuse him of softness. They hike through the desert, but Deion's fear of snakes causes problems when they encounter one in the wild.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth S1 Ep6
programme.desc: November-December - Full Circle - Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexicos forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Simien Mountains - Simien Mountains National Park in Ethiopia is home to some of the rarest creatures on earth. Take a glimpse into life on some of the highest peaks in Africa, in the last stronghold of shaggy, grass-grazing Geladas, elusive Simien wolves and horned Walia ibex.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Southern Drylands - The Southern Drylands is a journey into the most arid and extreme environments in the furthest reaches of southern Africa. We go to spectacular but treacherous places where almost no rain falls, to find incredibly resilient creatures and learn the secrets to their survival. From the largest mammals to the fastest insects and even a ghost-like fish found nowhere else in the world, the Southern Drylands contain some extraordinary inhabitants, all connected by the daily challenges of living in some of most inhospitable habitats in the world.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Etosha: The Great White Place - Etosha was once a great lake that dried up and now only fills with water seasonally during the summer rains. Once the Etosha pan is full of water, a myriad of water birds congregate in the shallow lake to breed, most notably Greater and lesser flamingos.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Linear Oasis - Follow the course of South Africas Orange river from its origins to where it spills out into the Atlantic Ocean. Along the way we encounter a diverse range of habitats and the creatures they support, from the dry lands of the Richtersveld to the beauty of Augrabies; this is the story of the Linear Oasis. We reveal how life is adapted to survive along its course and discover a rich world of plants and animals.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Iceland: Fire - Learn about the worlds largest volcanic island, a lone and rugged place where steam escapes, water explodes, and new ground is born every day. See how fire and ice collide in a battle that makes this the most geologically powerful island on earth.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Invasion Begins - When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Strength in Sisterhood - The Hollywood pride reels after the Nomads brutal attack on their leader, Ava, leaves her desperately weak and unable to hunt. To add to her woes, her hungry pride start rejecting her. But without her, they struggle to bring down prey.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Punks on the Run - The lions of the Nomad pride rampage deep into the heart of the MK prides territory, scattering its members and coming dangerously close to the five new MK cubs. Meanwhile, the Hollywoods are recovering, and Avas survival skills are still intact.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Punks Strike Back - After the dry season lowers the waters, siblings Kimba and Maya risk crossing the river to search for their parents. They run the gauntlet of the densest populations of crocs and hippos in Africa, and face an even greater threat on the other side.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Hollywoods Held Hostage - During the last few weeks of the dry season, the prides stick close to the only available water in the river. But in Luangwa, that proximity spells danger - especially when the scent of a hippo kill compels the Hollywoods to cross the river.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Next Dynasty - The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Invasion Begins - When the all-female Hollywood pride encounters the Nomads, a new pride of rival males, they may have found the answer to their mating dry spell. But they quickly realize that it will not be a happy encounter.

programme.desc: Alaskan Glacier - One hour of uninterrupted glaciers from Alaska.

programme.title: Big Cat Country S1 Ep5

programme.desc: The Next Dynasty - The all-female Hollywood pride have been in exile after being attacked by the four Nomad brothers. But their leader, Ava, decides to lead her family south to the heart of their territory for a showdown with the Nomads.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Gates of Hell - Italy's Mount Etna is one of the best places for volcano watchers and volcanologist Tom Pfeffier is hoping to get lucky and see a paroxysmal eruption, a short and very intense eruption that produces spectacular lava fountains.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon S1 Ep5
programme.desc: From Cloud to Coast - Monsoon storms sweep over the tropical island of Sri Lanka, and water carried in with swirling mists hits the mountainous heartland, beginning a journey through the many changing faces of the islands forests.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Life on the Wing - Yala National Park is an avian Eden, home to 215 species of bird. This paradise offers many possibilities for parents who can weather the ever-changing climate. Every species must either raise their offspring here or find a new home before the dry season ends and the monsoon storms begin.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule the World S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life Givers - Learn how bees, butterflies, moths, and other pollinators keep our fields and forests fruitful, and weigh what life would be like if these busy bugs vanished. Witness a mysterious butterfly pilgrimage and a moths clever way of escaping hungry bats.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Slammin' Salmon - Join the frantic dash to cash in on Julys salmon run with the Stage 1 winners and some tough new recruits. Tag along on BigBoi's food-finding road trip, welcome QuadMom and RedBack to the feast, and see if BoldFace can keep her surviving cub safe.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge S1 Ep3
programme.desc: So Long and Thanks for All the Fish - Bundle up as an icy October storm complicates the race to the finish line. See Big Boi bounce after a stumble before tragedy hits QuadMom, and cheer as fan fave BoldFace hits her stride despite her clingy kid, Raccoon. But who will wear the crown?

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Born to Be Wild - Trouble brews when the team makes the final attempt to reunite reluctant mother Dilla with her new baby Delilah. And Alba, the worlds only known albino orangutan, amazes her friends with her unique approach to termite foraging.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas S2 Ep2
programme.desc: Iceland: Ice - Tour an island built by volcanoes, but sculpted by ice. About 1.5 million years ago, a sheet of ice descended from the north and covered the land. Today, massive glaciers continue to carve marine cliffs and cut down mountains.

programme.desc: Gold Rush - Hiccup and the Riders, with help from Dagur hatch a plan to steal Berk's gold back.

programme.desc: A Fistful of Herbs - When Po discovers he was poisoned, he sets off to a caravan oasis in the hopes of finding out who the perpetrator is, unknowingly followed by the kid

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep6
programme.desc: A Cabbage Kinda Day - Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Mortys babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but its too much and she accidentally loses Mini-Morty. Shes going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants brain and defeat the nanobots leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants brain cells to the rescue! And when its all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep27
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Worrisome Wedge of the Water Warmongers - Harold and George can't wait to spend the summer together at camp. But not so fast, boys -- your old nemesis Mr. Krupp has a most unpleasant surprise.

programme.desc: The Pinging - Mr. Ping is possessed by the ghost of Master Mastodon, the ancient master sworn to protect the Tianshang storm wheels. After a ghostly sewer chase, Mastodon agrees to help our team to stop Klaus and Veruca. He reveals that their next step is to go across the sea to Central America.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep16
programme.desc: Mister Mastodon - Po and team arrive in Guatemala and meet farmers who are facing a mysterious threat-- named The Protector, wielding the Storm Wheels. Elsewhere, Colin the Stag Knight and Weimin team up to go after Po and discover Mr. Ping's connection to the widely feared Pirate Queen.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep8
programme.desc: Toad-al Recall - A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crews life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items but Jin and Peng arent so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toads magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.desc: When Will My Coloured Stripes Come Back? - Jess is playing puddle jumping, dodging the rain to have fun on a gloomy day when suddenly, just as the rain's stopping, the sun comes out and at the same time he sees a beautiful rainbow in the sky. He's desperate to show his friends, and it's not until he works out you need sunshine and rain at the same time to make a rainbow that he can show his friends the beautiful coloured shape in the sky.

George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep4
programme.desc: The Juice Badge - Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep5
programme.desc: The Footprint Badge - Duggee the lovable dog runs a club where children have adventures.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep28
programme.desc: Ronda Reunion, Spain - Foz tries to play a Spanish guitar, and Xuli is delighted when her first ever souvenir selfie flutters out of it. It shows her on holiday as a child in a Spanish town with her long-lost friend Maria.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Mud Volcano, Azerbaijan - Glitch's plan to use methane gas from a mud volcano to power Lars's new machine has explosive results! Can the bickering pair stop a huge fire and save the Grimbots?

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep30
programme.desc: Pan-American Highway, Panama - The team's Pan-American road trip leads them to discover that Glitch is building a road through the Darien Gap. Can they save this important habitat and protect the local sloths?

programme.title: My World Kitchen S4 Ep2
programme.desc: Vinnie's Bristolian Asparagus Tart - Vinnie's tarts are made of puff pastry with a cream cheese and asparagus topping. Yum!

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures S1 Ep12
programme.desc: Grizzly Bears - Andy, Jen and Scout head off on a global adventure to Sierra Nevada in California, searching for a mother grizzly bear and her cubs.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Captain - The Musical - In this episode Captain Captain has just finished writing her musical theatre masterpiece called Captain Captain - The Musical! Written by and starring herself, with Sandy and Seaweed!

programme.title: Panda and Krash S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Krash's New Friend - A beam of light sweeps through the window. Krash finds a glowing ball bouncing in the shop

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep28
programme.desc: Movies - It's Bluey's first trip to the cinema, but she's worried the movie will be too scary. When Bingo starts running amok in the theatre, she must conquer her fear and help Dad out.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep29
programme.desc: Library - When Muffin is told that she is special by her dad, she interprets it as an excuse to do anything she wants, which means playing Bluey and Bingo's game of library her way.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep30
programme.desc: Barky Boats - Bluey and Mackenzie are excited to spend time with their two buddies Mia and Captain; when the older kids run off to play together without them, Calypso explains that growing up can be hard.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep42
programme.desc: Broccoli Alone - Supertato is out chasing a milkshake robot and leaves Broccoli in charge of Tato Tower. Evil Pea tries to take over the tower, but Broccoli puts on a great defence.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep10
programme.desc: The Metal Detector Badge - Roly needs a wee, but the door is locked and Duggee has mislaid the key. Not to worry, Duggee has his metal detector.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep1
programme.desc: The Carrot Badge - The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep9
programme.desc: Go Jetter Heroes: Amelia Earhart - Inspired by her hero Amelia Earhart, Xuli attempts a solo flight across the Atlantic.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep10
programme.desc: Tulip Fields, Netherlands - Is Glitch stealing tulips from the Netherlands? That's what the Go Jetters think!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep30
programme.desc: Turtle Boy - Bingo finds a toy turtle at the playground and wants to take him home, but Dad says it's not the right thing to do.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep31
programme.desc: Onesies - When mum's sister Brandy comes over for a visit, she brings the kids onesies as a present, which has an unexpected effect on Bingo.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep32
programme.desc: Tradies - Bluey and Bingo hide under the house and spy on two mysterious tradies working in the backyard, wondering what they're up to.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep67
programme.desc: Tickly - The Teletubbies enjoy doing 'Round and Round the Garden', especially the end of the rhyme where they all tickle each other. The Tiddlytubbies have tickly fun too.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Hello, Hello (Eh-Oh!) - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and say "Hello".

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Jurassic Pop - A new museum opens, so Zip and his friends try to find a fossil for the display.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Dog Loves Dinosaurs - Dog and Pug go an adventure underground where they meet Granny Pug. They slide down a tunnel to the centre of the earth. When they arrive, they find some very friendly dinosaurs.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep15
programme.desc: Paperchase - Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Messy has a pair of yummy green socks waiting for him. He eats one, but where is the second? He visits OKIDO to find out.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Lolly's Keys - Messy monster is having breakfast and sees little objects on the fridge. Why don't they fall off? He goes to OKIDO to find out!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Clothes for Jimmy - The Kazoops are going shopping after Stan shrinks everyone's clothes in the wash, but when Monty is told Jimmy Jones won't be getting any new clothes, he begins to question why animals don't wear clothes just like humans do.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep15
programme.desc: It's Time to go Pond Dipping - JoJo and Gran Gran visit the wetland centre to go pond dipping with Cynthia. JoJo wants to see a dragonfly. She spots many pond creatures like diving beetles and mayfly nymphs.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep14
programme.desc: It's Time to Play Basketball - JoJo and Gran Gran run into Jared and Cynthia who are playing basketball. JoJo joins in, but she doesn't feel like she is tall enough to play it well.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Rainbow Race - The changeable weather means Rainbow has to leave before finishing his story. Sarah & Duck try to find out how the story ends.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep27
programme.desc: Perimeter Pals - Sarah, Duck & Bug set off on a big adventure, through uncharted territory, as they attempt to cycle all the way around the park.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep13
programme.desc: Laid Back Shane - Shane is having too much fun to stop and refuel. That is, until he runs out of coal and is stranded in the hot, red desert.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep27
programme.desc: Pirates - It's an adventure on the high seas as Bluey, Bingo and Missy play Pirates on the hammock swing, but they'll need to find their courage to withstand storms and whale attacks.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep28
programme.desc: Grannies - A game of 'grannies' is fun, until Bluey and Bingo can't agree on one simple question: Can Grannies dance? Now they need to video call Nana to get the answer.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep29
programme.desc: The Creek - Bored of the local playground, Dad and the kids go out bushwalking on a journey to their local creek. Cast out of her comfort zone, Bluey's eyes are opened to the beauty of the natural world.

programme.title: Supertato S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Desserts of Destiny - Evil Pea lures Supertato and Tomato into her cave of frosted doom. Can they find the courage to avoid her traps and retrieve The Lost Candle of Birthdays for Tomato's Museum?

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: HER Women in Asia
programme.desc: Breaking Chains - Economic insecurity is part of a cycle of disadvantages for women, often caused by discrimination in employment and education. HER meets three women striving to change that.

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: Can't Feel Nothing - How the Internet Warps Our Emotions - Is the internet making us emotionally numb? Online trolls and influencers expertly manipulate people's feelings, leading many to disconnect from their emotions. Scientists explain how the internet influences what we feel and whether we feel at all.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 317: Topuria vs. Oliveira
programme.desc: Main Event - Home to the UFC X Fan Experience and the UFC Hall of Fame ceremony, UFC International Fight Week 2025 will conclude on Saturday, June 28, with a stacked card at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas that features a highly anticipated lightweight bout between Brazilian superstar Charles Oliveira and former featherweight king Ilia Topuria. After vacating his 145-pound title to chase another world championship, Topuria will aim to follow up his knockouts of Alexander Volkanovski and Max Holloway with a finish of Oliveira, who is coming off a Fight of the Night win over Michael Chandler

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS - 10 hopeful efforts, 10 absolute beauties. Lautaro Martinez, Paolo Dybala, Hakan Calhanoglu and more from wayyy out.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC305DuPlessisvsAdesanya
programme.desc: Perth, Australia is the place as UFC presents a showdown that will shake the foundation of MMA. Middleweight champ Dricus DuPlessis defends his belt against former two time champion Israel Adesanya, who is hungry to regain the title for a historic third time. All this and much much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep4
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep3
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1002UsmanvsCovington2
programme.desc: UFC 268 was headlined by the heated rematch between welterweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and Colby Chaos Covington. Relive their incredible battle with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts Ep1004

programme.title: UFC Countdown EpUFC315MuhammadvsDellaMaddalena
programme.desc: UFC 315 Countdown takes an inside look at two title fights, as welterweight king Belal Muhammad attempts to defend his crown against Jack Della Maddalena, and flyweight queen Valentina Shevchenko puts her belt on the line against Manon Fiorot.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS - 10 hopeful efforts, 10 absolute beauties. Lautaro Martinez, Paolo Dybala, Hakan Calhanoglu and more from wayyy out.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Hill vs. Rountree Jr.
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the most dominant UFC champions of all-time returns to the welterweight division on June 15 when Kamaru Usman faces off with rising star Joaquin Buckley in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at State Farm Arena in Atlanta, Georgia. The king of the 170-pounders for over three years, Usman has his sights set on regaining his title, but on the fast track to the top is Buckley, who brings a six-fight winning streak into the biggest fight of his career. Plus, Miranda Maverick hopes to punch her ticket into the world title conversation by turning back former champion Rose Namajunas in a pivotal co-main event showdown in the flyweight division.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Hill vs. Rountree Jr.

programme.title: UFC Main Event EpUFC290MorenovsPantoja2

programme.title: UFC Connected Ep709
programme.desc: UFC Connected "Unbreakable: Michael Chandler, Fighter Focus: Dominick Reyes, Locked In: Carlos Prates, Take 5: Gillian Robertson" - Michael Chandler reflects on the Unbreakable bond with his wife Brie, a decades-long journey that has shaped him into the fighter and father he is today. Dominick Reyes opens up about a severe health condition that threatened to derail his rise in the UFC. Brazils Nightmare, Carlos Prates shares what fuels his love for the fight game. Submission specialist Gillian Robertson breaks down her top 5 submission artists in the UFC.

programme.title: UFC 317: Topuria vs. Oliveira
programme.desc: Prelims - Home to the UFC X Fan Experience and the UFC Hall of Fame ceremony, UFC International Fight Week 2025 will conclude on Saturday, June 28, with a stacked card at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas that features a highly anticipated lightweight bout between Brazilian superstar Charles Oliveira and former featherweight king Ilia Topuria. After vacating his 145-pound title to chase another world championship, Topuria will aim to follow up his knockouts of Alexander Volkanovski and Max Holloway with a finish of Oliveira, who is coming off a Fight of the Night win over Michael Chandler

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Hill vs. Rountree Jr.
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the most dominant UFC champions of all-time returns to the welterweight division on June 15 when Kamaru Usman faces off with rising star Joaquin Buckley in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night at State Farm Arena in Atlanta, Georgia. The king of the 170-pounders for over three years, Usman has his sights set on regaining his title, but on the fast track to the top is Buckley, who brings a six-fight winning streak into the biggest fight of his career. Plus, Miranda Maverick hopes to punch her ticket into the world title conversation by turning back former champion Rose Namajunas in a pivotal co-main event showdown in the flyweight division.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep4
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep3
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
